English.Name: Magnet Rise
English.Category:
"Basic Information"[CS:E][BAR][CR]
Gives the Pokemon that uses this move
the [LS:13742]Magnet Rise[LE] status. A Pokemon with
the [LS:13742]Magnet Rise[LE] status levitates and
can't be hit by Ground-type moves.
